title: Thank you Riot
body: due to riot Merch shop being unavaliable for me i was unable to purchase a championship thesh figure! if anyone has and is willing to sell lmk! ill glady take it off your hands and add it to my collection xD

replies.body: lol good luck with that its selling for over $100 on ebay lol
yea i saw! im willing to spend that much, but since its all from overseas i want to find someone in OCE
ok well good luck with that i  missed out too and dont have that sort of money to spend :(

yea, its unfortunate that riot didnt even do the restock... i was on every day but wouldnt allow me to purchase so i missed out :( but if im able to get my hands on two for a good price ill be happy to exchange to you for a good price :)
